txt.en:
'Hail, [placeholder]! I hear you are quite the foe-hunter in these parts. Perhaps we can work together, eh?

'I am a collector of odds and ends -- trophies of the enemy. I believe that someday they will be of great historical value, you see.

'A draugar named Iorwerth, the guardian of the Writhendowns Tomb, has woken and taken to walking about of late. Will you bring me his crest? I'll see that you are amply rewarded.'
Iorwerth, the guardian of the Writhendowns Tomb, has woken, and haunts the small island on which the tomb rests.
'Well done, [placeholder]! This trophy will be a lively addition to my ever-growing collection.'
Britric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have defeated Iorwerth, and should now return to Forlaw to collect your bounty.
Defeat Iorwerth and collect his crest
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Iorwerth can be found at the Writhendowns Tomb, guarding the barrow from outside.\n\nYou should summon and defeat Iorwerth and collect his crest.
